sellerCard.oneLiner: Your goto Website Wizard of WordPress, Shopify, Wix, Thinkific
sellerCard.description:
I am a Professional Web Developer with extensive knowledge of WordPress, Shopify, and WIX, Kajabi, Podia, Thinkific Website development. By choosing me as a performer for your project, you choose the confidence in a professional approach for your task.
Why should you choose me?
Because I'm able to create a perfect website for your business that highly converts. I will consider all your wishes If necessary, The website made by me will please not only you but also your customers.

My main skills:
#Learnworlds Certified
#WordPress 
#Shopify
#LMS Expert 
#Elementor
#Teachable
#Thinkific

description.content:
When it comes to promoting your business's online presence, there's no better starting point than a professional, neat, and easy-to-navigate web design. 


I will create stunning, responsive Wordpress website, Landing Page of any type with proficiency.


Do you need an attractive, professional wordpress design, landing page design or redesign site for: 

  • Business
  • Restaurant
  • Blog post 
  • Travel agency
  • Online store
  • Amazon affiliate design
  • E-Commerce etc
  • Drop Servicing 
  • Drop Shipping 
  • Real Estate


Whats I will Provide

100% Client satisfaction

Installation of Wordpress

Highly professional and responsive website

SEO and Mobile friendly structure

Speed optimized website

Elementor, visual composer, Divi Page Builder support

Customized design

E-commerce with various payment integrations

Secured and user-friendly admin panel

Social media integration

Live chat integration

Mailchimp or other mailing lists integrations

Content upload

Wordpress customization

Transfer/migrate your Wordpress website to a new host.


Contact me today and tell me what you need! All requests are answered.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why I need to discuss before place order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You need to make sure your hosting, domain, content is ready. This is important to discuss before order so that I get all information. If you don't provide materials, information which need and you ask to cancel, I will not be able to cancel the order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You would need a domain and hosting account. If you don't have any then don't worry I'll assist you. I'll also need your company logo(optional) & a total number of pages for the website. e.g. Home, About Us, Services, Contact Us, Blog. I'll further need content (text, images) for these pages.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide domain or hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I don't provide domain and hostingBut, I will send you the best domain and hosting details for you. you will get the best deal for your website.just send me a message for the deal.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you upload website on our hosting to make it live?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do this without any extra charges. I will need username and password of your hosting or Cpanel detail.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide multiple revisions. Your 100% satisfaction is my first priority.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Would I be able to easily manage my website from admin panel? I don't have any knowledge of programming.
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you will be able to easily add /update/delete/ maintain a website from admin panel without any programming skills. I will provide the username and password of the admin panel.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be Mobile Friendly/responsive ?
Will My website be SEO Friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, The basic structure of your website will be SEO Friendly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I see some samples of your work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can drop me a message to see samples of my work. I'll respond to you in a short time.

milestones.title: Requirements
milestones.description: We'll make sure I have everything needed to complete your project.

steps.title: Research
steps.description: I’ll do research based on your needs.

steps.title: Specifications
steps.description: I'll write the specifications for your site's functionality and features.

milestones.title: Planning
milestones.description: I'll use your provided requirements to start planning your website.

steps.title: Design Concept
steps.description: I'll design a concept for your website.

milestones.title: Website Design
milestones.description: I'll create the design for your website.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: I'll develop the website and deliver a working product for your review.

steps.title: Content Upload
steps.description: I'll upload your content (copy, images, videos, etc.) to your website.

steps.title: First draft
steps.description: I'll prepare a first draft of the delivery.

milestones.title: Modifications
milestones.description: I'll modify assets based on your feedback.

steps.title: Follow-up session
steps.description: We'll have a follow-up session to discuss any open questions.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

reviews.comment: Ali was very helpful in helping me to solve some of my issues.

seller_response.comment: Thank you! Glad I could help!

reviews.comment: Did a great job as always! Thank you!

seller_response.comment: Thank you! I’m delighted that you enjoyed the work, and I look forward to collaborating with you in future endeavors.

reviews.comment: Great work so far. Will be having him do updates as well as I grown my site. Easy to work with, great communication.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your kind words! I’m delighted to hear you’re satisfied with the current work. Looking forward to assisting with updates as your site grows. Your ease of collaboration and excellent communication make the process enjoyable. Thank you for the tip. Cheers!
